sys_cb_topic.description: Sample conversation flow to grant access to repositories
sys_cb_topic.name: Report IT Issue

sys_update_version.name: sys_cb_topic_862e17ec970b211066deb296f053af7a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_cb_topic"><sys_cb_topic action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><applicability/><applicability_mode>query</applicability_mode><autopilot_topic>false</autopilot_topic><category>140e2eda0b203300a1b16c2367673af4</category><channels/><connect_queue/><description>Sample conversation flow to grant access to repositories</description><expose_on_palette>false</expose_on_palette><flexible_conversation_switching>false</flexible_conversation_switching><graph>{
  "graph_api_version": "1.0.41",
  "goals": {
    "primary": {
      "id": "primary",
      "trigger": {
        "type": "primary"
      },

          "stepType": "ChoicePrompt",
          "name": "Choose repo",
          "prompt": {
            "value": [
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": ""
                  },
                  {
                    "text": "To which repository do you want to request access?"
                  },
                  {

              }
            ],
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "confirmMessage": {
            "value": "",

            "mode": "simple"

          "applicability": {

          },
          "optional": false,
          "defaultValue": {

            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "variableId": "b645e4695a884ef1b4f6d98a5bd25129",

          "skipIfFulfilled": false,
          "entity": {
            "id": ""

          "skippable": {

            "mode": "query"
          },
          "cardMetadata": {
            "mode": "card",
            "metadataScript": "",
            "cardTemplate": "",
            "cardFields": {},
            "cardDefinition": {}
          },

        },
        "8f93a48e9d2c43ce9a48d7590f4943b4": {
          "id": "8f93a48e9d2c43ce9a48d7590f4943b4",
          "stepType": "Decision",
          "name": "Did user choose a repository?"
        },
        "45e0337ec35541c8a84a32b0e93976c2": {
          "id": "45e0337ec35541c8a84a32b0e93976c2",
          "name": "Grant access to repository (placeholder)",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    /* Example code to trigger an Action that invokes a REST/SOAP integration step\n       to grant current user the access to the requested repository.\n     */\n    /*\n    try {\n\n\t\tvar inputs = {};\n\t\tinputs['user_sys_id'] = vaInputs.user.getValue(); // String \n\t\tinputs['requested_repository'] = vaVars.selectedRepo;\n\n\t\t// Start Asynchronously: Uncomment to run in background. Code snippet will not have access to outputs.\n\t\t// sn_fd.FlowAPI.startAction('global.setup_repository_access', inputs);\n\t\t\t\t\n\t\t// Execute Synchronously: Run in foreground. Code snippet has access to outputs.\n\t\tvar outputs = sn_fd.FlowAPI.executeAction('global.setup_repository_access', inputs);\n\n\t\t// Get Outputs:\n\t\t// Note: outputs can only be retrieved when executing synchronously.\n\t\tvar output = outputs['output']; // String\n\t\tvar error_message = outputs['error_message']; // String\n\t\tvar windows_error_code = outputs['windows_error_code']; // String\n\n\t\tvaVars.status = output ? output.status : false;\n\t\t\n\t} catch (ex) {\n\t\tvar message = ex.getMessage();\n\t\tgs.error(message);\n\t}\n    */\n\n\t// Example for testing purposes\n    vaVars.status = (vaVars.selectedRepo !== 'box') && (vaVars.selectedRepo !== 'ErrorRepo');\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "b9ef17b8181b403a9831ea1c50645611": {
          "id": "b9ef17b8181b403a9831ea1c50645611",
          "stepType": "Decision",
          "name": "Access successful?"
        },
        "84c3715c3fee4ce0b239b9d2315afbe1": {
          "id": "84c3715c3fee4ce0b239b9d2315afbe1",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Granted access",
          "value": [
            {
              "value": "(function execute() {\n    return gs.getMessage(\"I've granted you access to {0}.\", vaVars.selectedRepoDisplay);\n})()\n",
              "mode": "script"
            }
          ],
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          },
          "secure": false
        },

          "stepType": "Prompt",

        "409a8951e3824cecaddaca1ebac558c9": {
          "id": "409a8951e3824cecaddaca1ebac558c9",

                      "text": "Sorry, you cannot access that repository."

        "b8fd4ac1dc194957b228447202b26dab": {
          "id": "b8fd4ac1dc194957b228447202b26dab",
          "name": "Set repository name",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    var selectedRepo = vaInputs.choose_repo.getValue();\n    if (selectedRepo !== 'enter_manually') {\n        vaVars.selectedRepo = selectedRepo;\n        vaVars.selectedRepoDisplay = vaInputs.choose_repo.getDisplayValue();        \n    } else {\n        vaVars.selectedRepo = vaInputs.ask_description.getValue();\n        vaVars.selectedRepoDisplay = vaVars.selectedRepo;\n    }\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
